nodes.bodyText: Seem this method is only used by replace(). If that's the case, you should make it private.
Got it, yeah it's definitely more of a helper function--changed!

I'll discuss this more tomorrow during our sync-up, but basically it's a method for changing an entry in the location field to a number such as -1. In order to keep the invariant that location exactly models the query, we should change the numbers to -1 in replacement, but not doing so doesn't really lead to issues regarding performance so I was debating if I should use it or not.
